title: When Love Prevails
description: When Robin North needs a change of life, she takes a job out on a distant ranch in Montana under false pretenses. When she arrives, the handsome ranch owner is less than happy that she's there, and her appearance stirs up lots of emotion about a mysterious and unsolved death that occurred over five years before. Her heart is falling for the rancher, she's determined to solve the mystery that keeps his entire family frozen in doubt and pain. But will the answers free his heart to love again, or will the things she discovers mean that her beloved cowboy will be charged with murder and never be free again? When Love Prevails is a sweet romance with lots of emotion, but NO graphic sex.
author: Christine Bush
